channel.title: R on Lucas A. Meyer - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Lucas A. Meyer - Blog

item.title: Will it render
item.description: I’ve just updated my site to the new blogdown (0.10) and the new Hugo Academic (3.3) versions. I’m wondering if it will render. It was not trivial My first attempt was to simply rename the old academic theme in the themes directory and download a new one. However, there are a lot of breaking changes between version 2.4 and version 3.3. One of the main breaking changes is that now you can use page bundles instead of a single page per post.
